actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Departments of the Treasury, State, and Commerce.

official_title: A bill to temporarily increase the duty on Canadian softwood lumber and wood shingles and shakes.
short_title: American Softwood Lumber Stabilization Act of 1985

summary.text: American Softwood Lumber Stabilization Act of 1985 - Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the duty, 15 days after the enactment of this Act, on Canadian softwood lumber, wood shingles, and shakes. Decreases the duty on such items after December 31, 1986, and on or before December 31, 1988.

titles.title: American Softwood Lumber Stabilization Act of 1985
A bill to temporarily increase the duty on Canadian softwood lumber and wood shingles and shakes.
